Make Sure You Can Log In to the Event
Virtual Event
Jan 25 – Feb 9, 2021
Make Sure You Can Log In to the Event

QSC 21 is starting Monday! If you haven’t logged in to the event platform, please do so by opening any email sent by QSC EMEA 2021 from the address hello@swapcard.com and clicking on any blue button, like the one here:

If you have trouble logging in, visit https://login.swapcard.com and enter the email address used to register for the event. If you still cannot log in, please reset your password by clicking on SEND ME A MAGIC LINK.

Once you have access, you’ll be able to plan out in detail your conference days. Use the ‘My Agenda’ feature to create your personalized schedule with all the sessions you want to attend live. That way, the moment the conference kicks off, you'll know what you want to watch and when.


REMINDER DATES:


Conference sessions, including keynotes, customer best practice sessions, and Qualys use cases, occur from Monday, Jan 25 to Monday, Feb 1, starting at 8:30 AM GMT daily.


The free training and certification classes will run from Tuesday, Feb 2 to Tuesday, Feb 9.


See you soon!
